pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Discrete Multivariate Mixed Membership Models // Fits mixed membership models with discrete multivariate data (with or without repeated measures) following the general framework of Erosheva 2004. This package uses a Variational EM approach by approximating the posterior distribution of latent memberships and selecting hyperparameters through a pseudo-MLE procedure. Currently supported data types are Bernoulli, multinomial and rank (Plackett-Luce).
